line.en: Asa had become a member, so one of Akari's\nconditions had been met, which meant there were\ntwo left to fulfill.
The lack of a teacher to act as advisor, and the\nlack of qualified personnel.
If the advisor is someone who has the\nqualifications, that would fulfill both at the\nsame time, but...
That would be just too good to be true.
'I'm sorry, I understand how you feel but I'm\nalready advisor to the Drama Club.'
'But you're not suited for drama!'
'Yeah, she's right!'
'Alright, pipe down. Now, I'm a Keifuu Academy\nteacher, but I really wanted to be involved in\nthe arts.'
'The arts are great, you know. You guys should\nstop making gliders and join the Drama Club.'
'No way!'
'I refuse!'
'...I must say I'm a little hurt.'
The teacher left, hurt, and we all slouched\nforward, dejected.
By the way, that was our homeroom teacher.
'So it's no good, after all.'
'This isn't going very well.'
'All of the teachers, are already involved with a\nclub.'
said Asa as she looked at the list.
That is a list of teachers at Keifuu Academy that\nAgeha had made.
It has information on their homeroom class, clubs\nto which they are advisor, and whether or not\nthey are on Tobioka-sensei's side.
Today, using that list, we've been going around\nand asking all the teachers who seem like they\nmight cooperate with us.
'But you did really well to get all of this\ninformation.'
'Don't underestimate my intelligence network!'
'All we've got left is Yamanobe-sensei...'
'We can't ask him. Even more of his hair will go\nwhite!'
'If that happens, he's in danger of his new wife\ndivorcing him!'
'Oh no...'
Our advisor last year, Yamanobe-sensei, is young\nbut he's married.

It seems that his wife is a slender, pretty
woman. After seeing her husband, who she'd just
married, ageing right before her eyes, she
screamed 'This shouldn't be happening!',
apparently.
I guess I can understand how she feels.
'She'll just have to accept it then.'
'You can't just decide something like that.'
'Yeah, don't you feel sorry for her? His wife's\nsaid to be very beautiful, you know?'
'So what are we gonna do?'
'Well...'
'Hmm... Let's think of another way.'
It's after school - We're taking a day off from\nclub activities.
The materials we ordered still haven't arrived,\nso we've stopped working.
Which is why, for the first time in a while,\nwe've got nothing to do after school.
'Ageha, you don't have any club activities today,\ndo you? Let's stop by somewhere on the way home.'
'Sorry, there's something I need to do.'
Ageha refused the invitation of the girls in the\nclass and came over to me.
'Hey, Aoi. You're free now, aren't you? Come\nshopping with me.'
'Where do you wanna go?'
'To the underground shopping arcade at Windy.'
Kotori goes past us as we are talking.
'Kotori, what are you up to?'
'Me? I'm gonna stop by the secret base on the way\nback.'
'Huh? Why's that?'
'There's a little something I want to do.'
'I see...'
I wonder what Asa's up to.
We've told her we're taking a day off, so perhaps\nshe's gone somewhere to hang out with Yoru?
'Hey, Aoi, come with me.'
